ratings.comment: My favorite professor at UW. She truly cares about her students and wants them to succeed. I wouldn't be where I am today without her. Take her class!

Kathyrn did a great job of teaching communicative disorders and provided a study guide for tests. I recommend attending classes because there are in-class activities for one. For two, she's a great lecturer with a tremendous background and specialized hands-on experience as an SLP herself.

genuinely one of my favorite profs I've had at UW so far! she's so sweet and is very clearly passionate about communication sciences. the topics she covers in lecture are identical to the info in the textbook, so I felt like I could get away with doing one or the other most of the time.

Prof Basco is one of the sweetest and most caring profs ever! You can tell how deeply she cares for her field and the students. Textbook reading once a week with a homework that pairs with it. Exams were all multiple choice, open note & super easy. (If taking with honors, just two 5pg papers based on a book or movie). She's also a super easy grader
she is an angel and the best professor at UW-Madison. if you are able to take a class with her, do it

One of the best profs. Ive had at UW so far. She is incredibly helpful and understanding, especially during the pandemic. She is clearly an expert in her field and can answer almost any question you have related to CS+D. She cares about you and wants you to succeed. Lectures and readings are straightforward.
One of my favorite classes I have taken and Professor Basco makes the lectures super interesting and easy to follow. Would 100000% recommend this class to everyone, especially with Professor Basco.

She was amazing, extremely caring and really wants everybody in the class to do well. She inspires kindness and learning, not just giving information and moving on. Would absolutely recommend any class with her. The material covered was backed with personal experiences that made learning easy. I looked forward to her class every day.
